name: Schenker Simulator 2017
description:
This is a Quality Experiance about how it feels to work on DB Schenker. Will you survive or take suicide after the first 60 seconds cause you are too bored? Why not give it a try... This game is handcrafted 100% Pure Gold Exclusive just to make sure you Hate it or Love it.

Alright enought talking trash, this game is a funny simulator game that you can play for Youtube or just play it yourself. Simple and Enjoyable! :D
